Description: You are bidding on a gorgeous 2008 Fender American Standard Stratocaster guitar, sunburst, new G&G deluxe case, extra pick guard in excellent condition. I picked this Strat from a half-dozen sunbursts, and made it my studio recording guitar. It has an absolutely awesome sound and feel!! Features include a Delta Tone no-load mid and bridge tone control, vintage-style bridge saddles spaced at 52.5mm, comfy lowered string height screws, copper-infused steel vibrato block with higher mass and enhanced tone, vintage American staggered Alnico V single-coil pickups for phenomenal variety of sounds, very resonant alder sunburst nitrocellulose lacquer body, a vintage-feeling “C” 9.5” radius profile rosewood neck with perfectly rolled edges and mid-high jumbo frets (this neck feels SO great) and improved satin finish, and was made with care in the USA (body made by “Elena” #540141 Oct. 2008, neck Nov. 6 2008, pick guard and pickups Nov. 11 2008). NEW (unused, purchased in 2008) super-deluxe G&G tweed case. TWO pickguards, white and tortoise-shell. Manual and original accessories. The only blemish is three tiny dents on the upper bout, otherwise perfect condition. You will fall in love with this exceptional, hand-picked USA Strat from a superior production year!Year: 2008Serial: Z8227618Model: American Standard Series Fender Stratocaster electric guitarCondition: ExcellentModifications: NoneComments: Hand-picked for its exceptional features and soundNew G&G Deluxe tweed case ($200 purchase in 2008)Extra pick guard included: white and tortoise-shell ($70 purchase price) 3-ply Everything I sell is guaranteed. If you don't like it for any reason, simply send it back for a full refund, just pay the return shipping. I ship within eBay policies of 3 business days after payment clears. Saturday, Sunday, and holidays don't count as business days. I Print postage/address labels first then the next day pack the items so tracking won't show immediately. I am disabled so occasionally I am a little slow shipping. If you need something shipped quickly (like for a birthday or whatever) let me know and I'll get it to you as quickly as I can. To my CALIFORNIA buyers. I have a CA State Resale License and am required to collect CA sales tax on local sales. I then remit the funds collected to the CA Board of Equalization each January. If you have a resale license, let me know & send me the number. I will then remove the sales tax. I have been a full-time eBay seller for almost 15 years. Prior to that I was a police officer for 30 years and a high school teacher for 5 years. I was diagnosed with throat cancer and congestive heart failure (CHF) so I had to retire. Now I enjoy finding things that collectors like and selling them on eBay. I complete over 1,000 auctions per year and like to keep my customers happy. I have many return customer and would like to have you as one also.
Title: 2008 Fender American Standard Stratocaster guitar, sunburst, new G&G deluxe case
